plugin.name: Blend-Charm
plugin.description:
A PyCharm Plugin that simplify the development of Blender Add-On inside the PyCharm IDE.

Available for boot Community or Professional editions of PyCharm.
plugin.change-notes: ## Changelog - **[Run Configuration]** Settings: You can now edit and change your Blender Run Configuration settings! - **[Run Configuration]** Enviroment: You can now set indipendent enviroment variables between your configurations!
